project.Title: The Crow
project.ItemDescription:
New Class Mod, the Crow, for Darkest Dungeon ================================================
This mod brings you the crow as a new playable class in Darkest Dungeon.
The Crow is a backline DPS and also a powerful blighter. With his large skillset, he'll be useful in a lot of situations. Direct dmg, mark, DoT, crowd-control and self heal/buff are amongst what he is capable of.
================================================
If you think there is a problem with this mod please tell me and I will try to resolve it. Please take a look at my other mods :
The Vampire : http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=900069986&searchtext=
Anti-grind & Larger Roster : http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=903788427&searchtext=
The Inquisitor : http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=905786110&searchtext=
Global Hero Balance : http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=908501399
